content: This is by far the most unprofessional and irresponsible app I have ever used. I placed an order, it was accepted, but the food was never delivered. When I called the delivery boy, he simply dropped the call. I tried reaching the helpline, but no one ever picked up. To make things worse, the app did not cancel my order, did not notify me, and left me completely in the dark. The entire day passed without any response. This is not a one-time issue‚Äîit has happened to me multiple times.
Need to more rectify and update overall into app. Like - products visualization, payment system, Discount and GiveWay... best of luck. May Allah bless with you.
Who the hell give more than 1 star to this garbage app? Nothing is found in this app. Totally absurd.

This app has become horrible over time. It went on a hiatus for a couple of months, and then came back, with even more bugs. Today I ordered food, and for 50 minutes, not a single rider took my order!!! I called the support and the call doesn't even go to that number!! Is this a joke?? Even not a single news if there is any maintenance going on or something. It has become totally rubbish.
Could not even log in. No verification message was ever received in my number.
You are under maintenance since forever... There is no other delivery system in gazipur.. Really disappointed! Please fix it quicklyyyy
Fastest way to get favorite food.
They cheat on price and then told people they doesn‚Äôt charge for delivery. Recently they added delivery charge with cheated price.
Worst food delivery aap I have ever seen.
The app is great. It could be better if some features are added. Like ETA.
Very good üôÇ... They're amazing to deliver fast... I love them
Very bad optimization in the app.
Good UI but needs to fix some bugs like location feature is showing some errors. And should have a feature to open a business account for home base business.
Good but should include some MORE restaurant
Easy to use,fast delivery, good behaviour, overall perfect app.
Good initiative. Received food in a very shot time
Main thing in every business is service. In service they are the best.
